Gilza_single_fire_input_buffering_desc: If enabled, your "Fire Weapon" keybind inputs will be remembered if they were pressed in-between single fire mode weapon shots. This improves overall feel of single fire mode for low rate of fire weapons. This does not affect weapons with ROF lower than 150 rounds per minute.
Gilza_v_fov_desc: Change vehicle FOV for both driver and passenger. Works in-game, but you will have to re-enter the vehicle to see the change. Range: 75-105
Gilza_melee_gui_desc: Choose how Gilza's melee info UI will appear on your HUD when you charge your melee weapon. Charge time is shown as an interaction circle, and damage is shown as a % value. For chainsaw weapons damage is shown as "damage per second".
Gilza_blackmarket_weapon_sorting_desc: Choose how weapons are sorted based on damage while selecting to buy a new one on the blackmarket - disabled, ascending (low to high) or descending (high to low). Does not apply to special weapons tab.
Gilza_General_And_Skills_page_desc: Click this button to open Gilza's "General and Skills" info page in your (overlay) browser.
Gilza_Perks_page_desc: Click this button to open Gilza's Perks info page in your (overlay) browser.
Gilza_Weapons_page_desc: Click this button to open Gilza's Weapon info page in your (overlay) browser.
Gilza_patch_notes_desc: Click this button to open latest Gilza's patch notes in your (overlay) browser.
Gilza_skills_sub_menu_desc: Configure options related to Gilza's changes for skills and perks
Gilza_spoof_custom_perks_desc: When enabled Gilza's custom perk decks will be shown to other players as default perks instead of their real id's (for example "Speed Junkie" will be shown as "Crook"). Recommended if you plan on playing on higher difficulties in public lobbies.
Gilza_perk_reset_desc: Resets your perk deck progression. Does not reset accumulated amount of perk points. This allows you to re-acquire all perks in whatever order you prefer.
Gilza_shotgun_skill_notification_desc: Adds a pop up notification when you recieve a speed bonus from "fearmonger" skill.
Gilza_menace_points_notification_desc: Adds a pop up notification when you gain menace points while using Stockholm Syndrome skill.
Gilza_designated_marksman_zoom_desc: Change how much extra zoom "Designated Marksman" skill will provide. Vanilla PayDay 2 provides you with 1.5x zoom by default. Heist restart is required for changes to apply.
Gilza_junkie_header_desc: Adjust Gilza's Perk UI element that appears while playing with heavily modified perk decks.
Gilza_junkie_icon_scale_desc: Set the size of Gilza's perk UI element. Scales from 0.5 to 1.5. Default value is 1.
Gilza_junkie_icon_x_pos_desc: Set Gilza's perk UI element x position. This value represents how far from the left side of your screen this element will appear. Scales from 0 to 4000. Default value is 50.
Gilza_junkie_icon_y_pos_desc: Set Gilza's perk UI element y position. This value represents how far from the top of your screen this element will appear. Scales from 0 to 2000. Default value is 320.
Gilza_berserk_header_desc: Adjust visual flash effect while using berserker skill from fugitive skill tree.
Gilza_flash_trigger_desc: Choose when the on-screen berserker effect should trigger. Effect duration is tied to the skill duration. Note: combined option will override berserker flash type, and always use calm for melee duration and flash for weapon duration.
Gilza_flash_type_desc: Choose how the berserker screen flash will act. Calm refers to static screen effect, flash refers to flashing screen effect. Warning refers to the last 3 seconds of the effect.
Gilza_flash_size_desc: Choose how big the berserker screen flash will be. Small is default. Requires heist restart for changes to apply.
Gilza_flash_color_R_desc: Change amount of red colour in berserket flash. This is an RGB value from 0 to 255. Requires heist restart for changes to apply.
Gilza_flash_color_G_desc: Change amount of green colour in berserket flash. This is an RGB value from 0 to 255. Requires heist restart for changes to apply.
Gilza_flash_color_B_desc: Change amount of blue colour in berserket flash. This is an RGB value from 0 to 255. Requires heist restart for changes to apply.
Gilza_vhud_skills_sub_menu_desc: Configure options related to the VanillaHud+ buff list UI element.
Gilza_vhud_general_header_desc: Buffs that summarize total amount of a specific buff.
Gilza_vhud_compat_total_dmg_resist_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for total passive damage resistance percent. This bonus does not take into account resistances for specific damage types like melee or bullet.
Gilza_vhud_compat_total_dmg_absorb_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for total damage absorption amount.
Gilza_vhud_compat_total_dodge_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for total dodge chance.
Gilza_vhud_compat_stockholm_menace_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for your menace power from basic Stockholm Syndrome. Shows your total chances to spread panic.
Gilza_vhud_compat_body_economy_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for Body Economy reload speed bonus.
Gilza_vhud_compat_fearmonger_speed_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for Fearmonger movement speed bonus duration.
Gilza_vhud_compat_new_lock_n_load_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for Lock n' Load reload speed buff.
Gilza_vhud_compat_dire_need_override_des: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for enemy stagger on armor break upgrade duration from Backfire.
Gilza_vhud_compat_electric_bullets_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for the duration of electric bullets upgrade from Backfire.
Gilza_vhud_compat_revitalized_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for Revitalized cooldown.
Gilza_vhud_compat_unseen_strike_override: Enable VHUD's buff list tracker for Unseen Strike. Includes duration, cooldown and eligibility factor.
Gilza_vhud_compat_new_trigger_happy_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list duration tracker for Trigger Happy.
Gilza_vhud_compat_new_melee_zerk_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list duration tracker for berserker melee boost on armor break.
Gilza_vhud_compat_new_weapon_zerk_desc: Enable VHUD's buff list duration tracker for berserker ranged weapons damage boost on armor break. Cooldown included.
Gilza_vhud_compat_new_hitman_recovery_de: Enable VHUD's buff list duration tracker for Hitman's temporary armor recovery bonus that you get after a kill with akimbos/smgs/pistols.
